sense.gloss: outbreak (e.g. of war), outburst, sudden occurrence
erection (of the penis), becoming erect, stiffening
sudden rise to power, sudden rise in prosperity
erection when waking in the morning, nocturnal penile tumescence, morning glory, morning wood
flaring up (in anger), in a flare
pent-up (energy, enthusiasm, etc.), burning (e.g. ambition), irrepressible (e.g. desire)
to have an erection, to become erect
to become erect (penis, nipple, etc.), to tower (like an erection)
x: そそり立つ・そそりたつ
